## Poly.values() function

Returns a [PolySyncIterable](./polyethylene.polysynciterable.md) that yields the same elements as `Object.values` would.

**Signature:**

```typescript
function values<V, K extends PropertyKey = PropertyKey>(obj: Record<K, V>): PolySyncIterable<V>;
```

</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[PolySyncIterable](./polyethylene.polysynciterable.md)<!-- -->&lt;V&gt;

An iterable that yields the values of the passed object
